snippet.title: Iron Frontier Teaser
snippet.description:
Iron Frontier is a roguelike card strategy game.
Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2131290/Iron_Frontier/
Your job is to build and defend your base against enemy forces. The enemy relies on superior numbers. However with dozens of upgrades at your disposal you can set up a kill zone! With each battle you earn resources that will make your army permanently stronger. Rally your troops, find the best tactics and defeat the enemy hordes!
